definitions.definition: a situation in which there is aggressive competition between groups, companies, countries, etc.

examples.text: The US threatened a **trade war** with Europe after the breakdown of the talks.
They launched a trade war against France.

definitions.definition: a fight or an effort over a long period of time to get rid of or stop something unpleasant

examples.text: The government **has declared war** on drug dealers.

definitions.definition: an attempt to defeat your opponents by putting pressure on them so that they lose courage or confidence

definitions.definition: a bitter argument over a period of time between two or more people or groups
